title: IDA ATL C++ class reconstruction
content:
I'm currently using IDA Pro to analyze a dll, but IDA Pro doesn't analyze ATL standard classes properly, including CString, so I'm trying to reconstruct the classes manually, but I'm having some problems.

- I need to create a header file in C format to register many classes at once, which is too much work because classes are usually hierarchical.

- While member variable names and some virtual functions can be renamed automatically, simple methods need to be named manually.

Is there a more efficient way to solve these problems?
